sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnhpcminfo ( HPCM_ID /* */ , HPCM_SE_CODE /* */ , HPCM_DFN /* */ , HPCM_DC /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #hpcmId# /* */ , #hpcmSeCode# /* */ , #hpcmDfn# /* */ , #hpcmDc# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnhpcminfo SET HPCM_ID=#hpcmId# /* */ , HPCM_SE_CODE=#hpcmSeCode# /* */ , HPCM_DFN=#hpcmDfn# /* */ , HPCM_DC=#hpcmDc# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ WHERE HPCM_ID=#hpcmId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT HPCM_ID /* */ , HPCM_SE_CODE /* */ , HPCM_DFN /* */ , HPCM_DC /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ FROM comtnhpcminfo WHERE HPCM_ID=#hpcmId# /* */

SELECT HPCM_ID /* */ , HPCM_SE_CODE /* */ , HPCM_DFN /* */ , HPCM_DC /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ FROM comtnhpcminfo WHERE 1=1
HPCM_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
HPCM_SE_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY HPCM_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnhpcminfo WHERE 1=1
HPCM_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
HPCM_SE_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
